name: moon-ball
effect: Used by trainer in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost. If the wild Pokémon is a clefairy, nidoran m, nidoran f, jigglypuff, skitty, or any evolution thereof, the wild Pokémon has 4× its catch rate.
short_effect: 4× effectiveness on familes of Pokémon with a Moon Stone evolution. Made from Ylw Apricorn.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A Poké Ball that will make it easier to catch Pokémon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.
